name: I am... (Latrop)
description:
I am... - This is a small arcade game where you need to help a little girl named Nesmeyana cope with low self-esteem. There are several levels in the game with their own victory conditions.

The game was developed by Latrop and ShadowPi.

Music by Alena Smirnova, Kai Engel, Peter Rudenko, sawsquarenoise.

Mini Jam 121: Reflection
